block.p: Sara Ann Echaniz and Dr. Peter Carl Krause were married yesterday on Martha's Vineyard. Nicholas Basden, a friend of the couple who was appointed a Massachusetts civil marriage celebrant for the day, performed the ceremony at the summer home of the bridegroom's parents in Chilmark, Mass.
The couple, both 33, graduated from Harvard.

Sara Ann Echaniz and Dr. Peter Carl Krause were married yesterday on Martha's Vineyard. Nicholas Basden, a friend of the couple who was appointed a Massachusetts civil marriage celebrant for the day, performed the ceremony at the summer home of the bridegroom's parents in Chilmark, Mass.
The couple, both 33, graduated from Harvard.

Ms. Echaniz, who is keeping her name, is a program manager at ArtsConnection, a nonprofit organization that brings performing and visual artists into the New York City public schools. She received a master's degree in arts education from San Francisco State University. She is a daughter of Sara Katharine Echaniz of Taylors, S.C., and Carlos Echaniz of Rochester. Her father retired as an insurance claims investigator for the Metropolitan Life Insurance Company in Rochester. Her mother is the church organist and choral director at St. Giles Presbyterian Church in Taylors.

Dr. Krause is a chief resident in orthopedic surgery at the State University Health Science Center in Brooklyn. He received his medical degree from Stanford. He is a son of Dr. Marianne Schuelein and Ralph Krause of Washington. His mother is a neurologist at Georgetown University Medical Center in Washington. His father retired as a program director in the mathematics division at the National Science Foundation in Arlington, Va.
